text.text_translated:
Sometimes a bridge falls down. At first, engineers do not know why. They find the reason only after they study everything.

Sometimes, the builders used poor quality materials. Or an important part had a problem from the start.

In other cases, the design was the problem. The plan was to hold only a certain weight. The bridge could not hold more weight.
